item.description:
For this Meet-up we will return to the 2nd Story Theater in Warren, RI for "One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest." Here is their description of the play:

"Randall Patrick McMurphy is a charming, life-embracing rogue who contrives to serve a short sentence in a mental institution rather than a prison.  This, he soon learns, was a mistake.  Dale Wasserman's powerful adaptation of Ken Kesey's captivating novel is the stuff of great theater.  A modern American classic."

Ticket Information

Tickets are $25. Seating is General Admission.
Each person is responsible for purchasing their own ticket. For reservations, please call the 2nd Story Theater at 401-247-4200.

Please Note that Friday nights at 2nd Story do sell out early. Please do not wait to order your tickets! I strongly recommend that you order your tickets now.

When you order your ticket, please tell them you are a member of this group.  They will then reserve our seats together.

Meet-up Logistics

There is a fairly large parking lot located next to the theater between Market Street and Route 114 in Warren. A sign for Second Story Theater is on Route 114, although it's somewhat hidden. Identify yourself as a member of this group when you arrive at the theater and they will show you to our seats.
item.how_to_find_us: Tell the usher you are with our group when you arrive. He will show you to our seats.
item.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
